introduction: Hanju is a high school female track athlete who lives in the countryside with her medicinal herb-picking grandfather and disabled younger brother. They live a humble life in a small home, but they're happy.One day, Hanju's grandfather has an accident and is taken to the emergency room. They urgently need money for his surgery, so Hanju goes and asks for help from the pastor who had been helping her family out.[Jeonju International Film Festival : JIFF (2018) - Korea Cinemascape]
